skills.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
skills.description: [SP: 12][CD: 25s] Shoots ghostfire that sticks to the target, dealing 640 Lightning DMG every 0.5s to the target and nearby enemies for 8.00s.

skills.name: Futsuno Mitama
skills.description: Character gains 30% Total DMG Multiplier. Under Burst mode, enemies hit become conductive, taking 60.0% more Lightning DMG for 7s.
